headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 3X GTA$ and RP on Tiny Racers
content:
Zoom out and get a little bird’s-eye perspective in Tiny Racers, a nostalgic mode that punishes anyone who falls behind the pack with an explosive fate. It is a classic case study in survival of the fittest — with a few twists thrown in there for good measure.

All Tiny Racers contestants walk away with triple the usual GTA$ and RP, all week long.
